駺駺駺

駺字的基本解释

駺
liáng
〔吉駺〕马名。

駺
láng
白尾马。

駺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liáng］
［《集韻》回張切，平陽，來。］
传说中有白身红鬣的马，名为吉駺。

駺字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駺； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1439第15
【廣韻】魯當切【集韻】盧當切，?音郞。【玉篇】馬尾白。　又【集韻】呂張切，音良。【山海經】犬封國有文馬，縞身朱鬣，名曰吉駺。

駺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
駺字的起名意思

白尾马。也指良马名，如“吉駺”。

駺
Basic explanation of words
駺
liáng
〔吉駺〕The name of the horse.
駺
láng
White-tailed horse.
駺
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liáng］
["Jiyun" back to Zhangqie, Pingyang, come. ]
According to legend, there is a horse with a white body and a red hyena named Jiyun.
駺
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　駺; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1439 No. 15
[Guang Yun] Lu Dangqie [Ji Yun] Lu Dangqie,? Yin Yin. [Jade articles] Horsetail white.　[Jiyun] Lu Zhangqie, good sound. [Shan Hai Jing] The dog is a state-owned celebratory horse, and its body is a red hyena, and its name is Jiyun.
駺
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
駺
Name meaning
White-tailed horse. It also refers to the name of a good horse, such as "Jiyue".
láng
сущ. * белохвостая лошадь
